attributes.action: No to increasing electric bills to pay for new nuclear plant construction
attributes.additional_details:
The government has issued a white paper to support a new levy for all electricity customers to subsidise the building of new nuclear power stations.

We, the consumers of electricity, do not want our bills increased to pay for nuclear power plant construction!

This petition request that this government and any future government be bared from passing any legislation that provides any form of subsidy, levy on our electric bills, other monetary incentive, or tax releife to fund the construction of new nuclear power plants.

Say NO to ANY new nuclear power construction!
Say NO to using your money to help fund nuclear power.
